name: Inside (itch) (Notaghosty)
description:
Autumn goes to visit her hometown and tries to build a better relationship with her family, but that was interrupted by something ominous going on in town. People disappear and reappear, but not the same. She teams up with those who are left in town and stops it before it’s too late to save the town. But, how does she stop it if it’s within the people of the town?

The Demo version is available!
